name: Eun-byul Selous
profile: Curious, Intelligent, No moral restraint, A little edgy, Not afraid to fight or argue, Creative (Writer/Artist), Sometimes unpredictable

Eun-byul can recall with perfect clarity, as if the memory is right in front of her, something that she saw or heard. It could be a book she read, a game of D&D, or exactly how a person looked. This gives her a permanent +1 to intelligence, but a d20 -1 to speed and agility regardless of buffs when she uses the ability.

items.name: WM-D6C Sony Walkman
items.description: A cassette hidden in her jacket. Attachments include corded headphones on her neck and a handheld microphone in her jacket. 1 C90 Tape (90m) already in the Sony Walkman, and 1 spare with mostly pirated music on it.

items.name: Journal
items.description: Journal. Discoveries, ideas, and drawings are logged here. 1 small used pencil in her pocket, and 1 sharpened pencil in her ear.

items.name: Purse
items.description: A fashionable purse that holds several smaller items.

collectionItems.name: Hairspray
collectionItems.description: Travel-sized hairspray, can be used as a quick fix.

items.name: Hunting Knife
items.description: A simple pocket knife used for cutting ropes/hunting.

items.name: Slash Tires
items.description:
Eun-byul can slash a car's tires to prevent it from driving. Previous uses include 1 year ago against some poor soul in high school.

Requires knife

items.name: Finger Whistle
items.description:
Create a loud 120db finger whistle to attract attention.

Requires hands

items.name: Record Audio
items.description: Requires Sony Walkman, Microphone, C90 Tape 1 or 2. Record a sample of audio and save it to a track.

items.name: Play Music
items.description: Requires Sony Walkman, Headphones. C90 Tape 2. Listen to your playlist and ignore sounds from your environment.

items.name: Eye Poke
items.description:
Requires Sharp object (Pencil) & 'Balloons' thought which can be acquired by playing 'Pop The Balloons' at the amusement park.

Throw a sharp object at an undead demons eye.

items.name: Father
items.description:
Your father's name is Richard Selous.

He is a local journalist in Blackwood. He is also an Anglican Christian.

He used to be an on field journalist for the Vietnam War.

His ancestor is Frederick Selous.

items.name: Mercury
items.description:
The tremors in your left hand are caused by chronic exposure to mercury. This was verified by a doctors appointment, so you know this is true.

The only exposure you can think of was the incident where you ate a fish from Onondaga Lake in New York.

Your father and brother joke that your crazy ideas come from the mercury. This only makes you upset.

items.name: Mother
items.description:
Your mother shares some of the school of thought of Seon Buddhists. Ie Zen Buddhism, a branch of Mahayana Buddhism.

She is from South Korea.

items.name: Mike
items.description: Your older brother, Michael Selous, who enlisted in the navy. He sometimes writes to you.

items.name: Random Loser
items.description:
A kid you bullied 5 years ago. You slashed his parents tires for an entire month to see what he'd do to get to school.

It took him an hour and half to make it to school on average. You used this information to calculate walk times in d&d.
